original: autstshushm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: autstshushm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement called Utsasama

original: zhes so // 'di'i cho ga ni nya'i dus nas phyi ma'i tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du bsod snyoms bslangs pa'i zan la chang bu gcig la sngags bzlas la rang bza'/
analyzed: zhes so // 'di'i cho ga ni nya'i dus nas phyi ma'i tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du bsod snyoms bslangs pa'i zan la chang bu gcig la sngags bzlas la rang bza'/
translated: The rite of this [means of achievement] is that from the time of the new moon until the fourteenth of the following month, one should eat a single pill of food obtained by alms-begging, reciting the mantra over it.

original: gnyis pa la bzlas la chu la mar bsgyur la btang /
analyzed: gnyis pa la bzlas la chu la mar bsgyur la btang /
translated: Recite the mantra over a second pill and transform it into butter by means of water and give it to the practitioner.

original: zhag nyer gcig na gdol pa mo'i gzugs su byas nas sgrub po la lung ston te /
analyzed: zhag nyer gcig na gdol pa mo'i gzugs su byas nas sgrub po la lung ston te /
translated: After twenty-one days, she will appear in the form of a caṇḍālī and give a prophecy to the practitioner.

original: de la skyug bro bar mi blta'o //
analyzed: de la skyug bro bar mi blta'o //
translated: One should not look upon her with disgust.

original: de nas rang gi gzugs kyis gnas te ma 'am srid mo 'am chung mar gyur te dam bca' byas nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rang gi gzugs kyis gnas te ma 'am srid mo 'am chung mar gyur te dam bca' byas nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, she will remain in her own form and, having made a vow to be his mother, sister, or wife, she will follow him.

original: tshogs bsags pa'i gang zag gis zhag bdun na 'grub bo //
analyzed: tshogs bsags pa'i gang zag gis zhag bdun na 'grub bo //
translated: A person who has accumulated the accumulations will be successful in seven days.

original: bsod nams chung bas kyang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bram ze bas du zin kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsod nams chung bas kyang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bram ze bas du zin kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even one of little merit will succeed in twenty-one days.

original: grub nas di na ra lnga nyi ma re re la ster ro //
analyzed: grub nas di na ra lnga nyi ma re re la ster ro //
translated: When he has succeeded, he will give five dinars every day.

original: zan gyi chang bu ster ba'i dus su mi med par zan bza'/
analyzed: zan gyi chang bu ster ba'i dus su mi med par zan bza'/
translated: When he gives the morsels of food, he should eat the food in private.

original: mtshan mo gcig pur nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo gcig pur nyal bar bya'o //
translated: He should sleep alone at night.

original: autstshushm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: autstshushm'a zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Uṣṇīṣa is complete.
